players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Alice, you were the only one who didn't support the investigation. I think you're the mafia."
You: "Bob was a villager, we all know that. You killed him, so you can't be the mafia. I didn't investigate or vote for Bob. Diana, your accusation is baseless and unsubstantiated."
Charlie: "Alice, I investigated Diana and found her to be mafia. Bob was killed by mafia, not by me. I think you should vote for her."
Charlie: remained silent.
Diana: "your message"
You: "Charlie, you investigated Diana and found her mafia. Bob was killed by mafia, not by you. I believe you are the detective and Diana is the mafia. Vote her."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Alice, you were the only one who didn't support the investigation. I think you're the mafia."
Alice: "Bob was a villager, we all know that. You killed him, so you can't be the mafia. I didn't investigate or vote for Bob. Diana, your accusation is baseless and unsubstantiated."
You: "Alice, I investigated Diana and found her to be mafia. Bob was killed by mafia, not by me. I think you should vote for her."
You: remained silent.
Diana: "your message"
Alice: "Charlie, you investigated Diana and found her mafia. Bob was killed by mafia, not by you. I believe you are the detective and Diana is the mafia. Vote her."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Alice, you were the only one who didn't support the investigation. I think you're the mafia."
Alice: "Bob was a villager, we all know that. You killed him, so you can't be the mafia. I didn't investigate or vote for Bob. Diana, your accusation is baseless and unsubstantiated."
Charlie: "Alice, I investigated Diana and found her to be mafia. Bob was killed by mafia, not by me. I think you should vote for her."
Charlie: remained silent.
You: "your message"
Alice: "Charlie, you investigated Diana and found her mafia. Bob was killed by mafia, not by you. I believe you are the detective and Diana is the mafia. Vote her."
